titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Visit to China
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Visit to China FA881

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Visit to China

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research with select items restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: A group of Rockefeller University scientists made a trip to China, May 5 to May 22, 1977 to learn the situation as it exists in 1977 at a group of universities and research institutions in that country. The trip was made by a 20 person delegation. Arrangements for the trip involved two years of planning, arranged at the request of Dr. Seitz.

The officers and faculty members of the University on the delegation were: Purnell W. Choppin, M.D., Zanvill A. Cohn, M.D., James G. Hirsch, M.D., Maclyn McCarty, M.D., William Trager, Ph.D., Bruce Merrifield, Ph.D., Rodney W. Nichols, Floyd Ratliff, Ph.D., Frederick Seitz, Ph.D., Norton Zinder, Ph.D.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains: visit report and Zinder diary.

did.unittitle: Report on a visit to the People' Republic of China

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: (II) Technical Reports and Analyses by: Robert B. Oxnam, Maclyn McCarty M. D., Purnell Choppin, M. D., Zanvil Cohn, M. D., James Hirsch, M. D., Bruce Merrifield, William Trager, Floyd Ratliff, Norman Zinder.
(III) Additional materials including notes on tape-recordings, Press accounts, notes on artistic and cultural performances, biographical sketches of members of delegation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1-1A Tongue twisters. 1-2A-B Mme Hsieh. 2-3A Performance Nanking School of Arts. 2-3B Performance plus Middle School. 2-4A Nanking Middle School (Sun, Moon, Stars). 3-4B Nanking and Soochow. 3-5A Barefoot Dr. and Machine Tool Factory-Shanghai. 3-5B Hospital and 2nd Medical College Shanghai. 4-6A Continued Medical College Shanghai. 4-6B Institute Experimental Biol. Shanghai. 4-7A Institute Experimental Biol. Shanghai. 5-7B Institute Experimental Biol. 5-8A "Small Sund Society" and Institute Biochemistry. 5-8B Institute Biochemistry Shanghai.
